game.title: The Quest for the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure within the ancient ruins
game.description: This quest begins at the village square where you will receive a map from the old librarian. Follow the clues to uncover the location of the long-lost artifact.
game.reward: Ancient Treasure Chest, 100 Gold Pieces, Rare Artifact

task.objective: Visit the village square and speak with Old Librarian John Doe
Follow clue no. 3 in the library map to find the ruins
Locate and open the secret chamber within the ruins
